name: Futari no Tame ni Sekai wa Aru no
nutshell:
1-2) Futari no Tame ni Sekai wa Aru no (two chapters and an extra)
Asukagawa Chiharu is student body president of Ushitora High. Kisaragi Kyou is student body president of Ushitora's rival school, Bishin Academy. That naturally makes Chiharu and Kyou bitter rivals as well, but the relationship they hesitate to flaunt in front of the public eye is one of… lovers! They even have sex at hotels and are an average (!?) couple!!
See "Soko wa Nemuri no Mori," story 02: "The Star Knows Everything," for a side story of this manga.


Valentine Cinema


The Queen's Favorite

name: Kimi wa "Pochi" da! - Daigakuseihen
nutshell: Soushi, the son of a respectable and very wealthy family, starts to have feelings for his bodyguard, Yamanami. they are both well aware of their class differences which places an obstacle in their quest to be together. however, how will the arrival of a new love interest, Aoyama, affect their relationship?? this funny manga will reveal a deeper angle on their feelings.

name: Ace Maid
nutshell: A Maid must always be beautiful and stronger than anyone else, and respect her Master. The Maid who has all these qualities is called "Ace Maid". And there is a Tournament, a Festival, to select the No.1 Ace Maid in Akihabara.

name: The Elegant Duke's Teaching Methods
nutshell:
“You mean you want to play without knowing how to kiss?”
Lillian, Duchess of Astrid, receives several pictures one day. The main character in the picture is her husband, Asher Astrid.
In the photo, he was seen wearing a dog collar, kneeling, and being whipped by someone. In front of Lilian, even with a calm smile, he had never seen before.
Asher, who was found out about his secret hobby, asked for a divorce from Lillian, but she rejects him and offers punishment as a reward...
The secret teaching life of the elegant duke couple begins.



Original Webtoon <Peanutoon>


Original Webtoon <BookCube>


Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>


Original Webtoon <Bomtoon>


Original Webtoon <Comico>


Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>


Original Webtoon <Lezhin>


Original Webtoon <Naver>

name: Tidying Up for Her
tags: Oneshot,Romance,Girls' Love,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: A young woman is finally going to bring the girl she likes back to her house and decides it's in desperate need of a make over.

name: Shindo
nutshell:
The story begins when Uta Naruse, a primary school student, meets Wao, a high school graduate studying for the entrance examination of a music conservatory. They pursue their ideal music together and inhabit a world of perfect pitch.
Winner of the "1998 (The Second) Agency for Cultural Affairs Media Arts Festival award for excellence".

name: Devil's Bride
nutshell: After many years of living alone in a deep forest, the devil has gotten lonely. He decides to buy himself a human bride to cure his loneliness as well as help him shed his devil identity. But when his new, beautiful young bride dies suddenly after only a few blissful days, the devil decides this time to build himself a bride. First on his list of items to acquire for the construction of his perfect mate: eyes…

name: Hime to Onna Yuusha ga Musubareru Tame no 12 no Hijiri Koui
nutshell:
百合えっちで王国を救え!
ツッコミどころ満載のバトルファンタジー!
幼い頃から将来を約束していたセフィリア姫と女勇者レナリア。時が経ち、勇者はついに魔王を滅ぼして姫の城に帰還する。しかし、勇者が魔王に受けた呪いを解くには、姫の脱ぎたてパンツが必要らしく…!?

name: Tokyo Marble Chocolate
nutshell:
This is a sweet and heartwarming love story, told from the different viewpoint of the two young lovers, a girl named Chizuru and a boy named Yudai. They mean well but cannot seem to succeed at love. They want their relationship to succeed but a combination of uneasiness and lack of self-confidence keeps them from advancing to the next step.
Sometimes, it takes an unexpected third party to intervene in order to make two people realize what is right in front of them. That is exactly what happens in this story.
[*This is prequel to the 2 part OVA with the same title]

name: Majime ni Otsukiai
nutshell:
Raised in a household with the mottos "illicit sexual relationship prohibition" and "serious and sincere", Minami is currently in the companionship of her senpai at work for the 3rd month <3 they are in a pure relationship where they haven't even kissed. But Minami has a secret that she can't tell to the mature and calm him… That is, she reads ecchi manga at home and has delusions about them, in other words "a pervert who's always on their best behaviour"…!
At that time, she accidentally drops her ero-manga at her workplace…!?

name: Last Exile - Sunadokei no Tabibito
nutshell: After the first "Last Exile" series, Claus, Lavie, Alvis, and our other heroes board the colony ship, Exile, to return home to the planet humanity abandoned hundreds of years (ago/before). A few months have passed and the quiet, peaceful life they had hoped for is suddenly disrupted when a familiar enemy shows up. How did the enemy they left behind a world ago follow them all the way home!?

name: Kuroko no Basket - 36°C Danro (Doujinshi)
nutshell:
Pairing: Murasakibara x Himuro
Murasakibara is having a hard time to get out of his bed, on a snowy day...

name: More Puzzling Than A Riddle
nutshell:
What you need is "inspiration"! This is the beginning of a youthful riddle-solving comedy!
Saki Junjino, a student at Meichi Academy, has the looks, smarts, and athletic skill to be the best girl at Myochi Gakuen, but she also has an unusual fondness for riddles. Eita Ichinose is recruited by Saki to become a member of her riddle-solving club, and he has to figure out her brain-teasers every day after school! Wanting to spend time after-school with the beautiful senior, Eita will solve her riddles again and again... No knowledge or calculation required! You can try it for yourself!
(Source: Young Magazine, translated)

name: Taming the Ultimate Tyrant
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Office Workers,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
Kang Eun-Hyun, the CEO of "Red Fit," is considered the next-generation leader in the domestic game industry. There was only one thing he lacked, with his good-looking face and perfect physical: when he opens his mouth, his sharp words attack those listening!
Cho-Eun is Eun-Hyun’s secretary. With a calm and patient personality, she skillfully accepted the president's twisted words, and after work, continued her normal(?) work life by swearing at the same company colleagues and friends about Eun-hyun. However, Eun-hyun sharp words became worse as the days went by, and the moment she thought she had to make a decision whether to stay with Eunhyun, his words were so unexpected!
Cho-Eun personality remodeling love project, a universal secretary who tamed Eun-Hyun, the absolute tyrant!

name: Kyou, Aitsu (♂) ni Kyun to Shite Shimaimashita...!!
nutshell: A light BL short story collection written and illustrated by 13 splendid artists that's so precious it'll make your heart skip a beat! Best friends, childhood chums, unlikable punks, and strangers just encountered—we're both guys, but I fell in love with him!

name: Kid Detective Rock Holmes
nutshell:
(from MangaUpdates): This is a collection of short stories anchored by the tale of a young boy who fancies himself as a detective.

Volume 381 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works

name: Fox Wedding
nutshell: After Saving a fox Kit the Fox wishes to repay the favor with her devotion

name: Irene of Love Revisted
nutshell:
The story of a mixed couple, A Japanese man named Iwao Shishido and a Filipino named Irene. Foreign wife Irene suddenly appeared in a cold village like a blowing pool.

Note: This title has an original edition of 6 volumes and a shinsouban of 2 volumes, released in 2010. Most of the details here cover the latter edition.

name: Sun Dog Zero
nutshell: Zero is a wild dog who is saved by a boy named Taro after making enemies with hunters. Their carefree days of living on the streets are interrupted when Zero undertakes a journey to sharpen his fangs.

name: Revenge of the Heiress in Distress
nutshell: “I’m your sister! You owe me this!”“My daughter, please promise me that you’ll never bear a grudge against your sister for any of her wrongdoings.”Xiao Keyan could no longer take it. After her sister continually tarnished her name, and her family’s morals became like shackles to her, she had finally had enough.“One day, I’m going to take my baby back and nobody will be able to stop me!” she declared.The time would come when the ice and the snow would melt, and the winter plums would bloom. That would be the day when she would turn the tables.Wait and see.

name: Sunny & Rainy
nutshell:
One-shot from Feel Young Magazine.
A short story about a girl and her strange relationship with the rain.
Links:
Author's Twitter: @icori_a

name: Mekake no Koukyuuhi Ranking wa 133-banme no Youdesu
nutshell:
Beauty, wisdom, personality, degree of love - the "princess ranking" is regarded as absolute in this harem.
Amerei, who entered the harem at a young age, is the 133rd concubine. If nothing is done, the love of His Majesty, the Emperor will only remain a dream. But then a mysterious young man, Kasei, met Amerei and she ended up falling in love with him.
Kissing!?
No! This body is only for His Majesty, the Emperor! However, after I was embraced by him my "princess ranking" soared!
Wait! Could his true identity be that of the Emperor himself?

name: Yuri!!! on Ice - Nikaime. (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Yuuri x Viktor

name: Taiyou no Kishi
nutshell: Hinata was corrupted by his stepfather and he felt that he had lost the right to love his childhood friend, Tatsuya. He left home and became an escort to support himself. Soon, he met a pretty Shinto priest, Clayle, who gave him the spear of the light's fragment. After this encounter, Rele, knight of the sun shrine, suddenly appeared and told Hinata that he'd obey and protect the owner of the fragment. Clayle was imprisoned before they could find out more. What will happen from here?

name: Oshiete Katekyo
nutshell:
Uta, a seemingly perfect guy with no weaknesses, is invited to Minami's home as a private tutor. Minami's skills in bed are as pathetic as his grades, but thanks to Uta's help, he starts scoring better and "scoring" better! Excitement gives way to an all-out rollercoaster ride as they begin their lessons in love!!
Also included in this volume: A sweet, two-part romance about a hair stylist saving for marriage who ends up living with a divorcee, and a short story about a rough-and-tumble rival pair who can't stop arguing over who should "top" long enough to admit their feelings!!

name: Westwood Vibrato
nutshell:
Whatever instrument, the genius instrument repairman Cornelia Bobo Warshaw will tune it to your desire. From Yoon In Wan, the author of 'Island', 'New Amhanguhsah' and Kim Sun Hee, the author of 'Three Kingdoms of Go' comes a new creation about music and drama.

Note: Westwood Vibrato is a manhwa written by Youn In Wan with art by Kim Sun Hee. Originally released in Japan in black and white, it was later released as a Korean Webcomic in full color.

name: Shutterbox
nutshell: Megan Amano is a young photographer who has ties to the spirit realm. One day, when Megan captures a picture so mysterious, she questions everything around her. Follow Megan as she embarks on a journey that will have her more entwined with her fate in the world

name: Crossdressing Grandpa and Grandma
nutshell:
This elderly couple isn’t just cute! These are stories of their days after having practiced and perfected their ideal appearance!
Tatsuhiko and Haruko might seem like your average couple past their prime, but when nobody is looking, they change into Rose and Haruhiko and reverse their roles! Witness these two indulge in their sparkling and oddly stylish irregular but also ordinary daily lives!

name: Red Garden
nutshell:
This is the story of four girls with nothing in common save for a single friend who has suddenly gone missing.
What awaits them? A destiny far stranger than they could ever have imagined!

name: Kare no Barairo no Jinsei
nutshell: Natsuki Matsuda, twenty-years-old, has proudly identified as gay since age fifteen. Then Komano, nineteen-years-old, comes into his life. He's always been popular with the ladies, but he's a free-spirit who cannot be tamed – by man or woman! This is the story of their love. Can Natsuki handle Komano's bohemian nature in the long haul or will jealousy and possessiveness get the best of him?
